item.description: Kick Boxing: (Ages 18+) If you like taking out some aggression while working out, kick boxing is the perfect remedy. Each class is one hour. It incorporates kick boxing drills, tai boe,combos across the floor, and partner sparring.You will hit the bag, run sprints, do crunches, and leave the studio feeling like a million bucks. This month drop in classes are only $7 and ten packs are $60 Please register for the class at least 24 hours before at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com to save your spot!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Kickboxing
